message: I'm offering you a fair deal, Bob. Let's split it 90/10. It's a good start to our partnership!
Alice, your offer was quite bold. Let's be more realistic. I'm proposing 85/15. Time is money, and money is losing value quickly!
Bob, I understand the urgency, but I'm not willing to settle for such a small share. Let's meet in the middle and split it 75/25. It's a fair compromise, considering the inflation!
Alice, we're running out of time!  This is my final offer. It's a decent share considering the circumstances. Let's close this deal before the money loses even more value!
